document_data.caption: Nihiloor and its pet intellect devourers.
document_data.name: Nihiloor
document_data.mainbody: '''Nihiloor''' ({{Pronounce|NY|heh|loor|refs=}}) was a [[mind flayer]] who worked for the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], by creating and spreading [[intellect devourer]]s throughout the sewers of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Personality: The illithid had an alien mind and enjoyed scheming and plotting from the shadows. It considered itself Xanathar's equal but had no interest in supplanting the [[beholder]].
document_data.Activities: Nihiloor's main activity was to create [[intellect devourer|intellect devourers]]. It set them loose in Waterdeep, either in search for random targets to control or, occasionally, after specific targets such as members of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] or [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]]. Individuals dominated by the intellect devourers then proceeded to act as spies for Nihiloor or, in specific cases, to capture and bring slaves or hostages to [[Skullport]].
